name: sonarSurfirePlugin
description: add configuration for maven surfire plugin to confogure test execution using a pattern expression
code:
<!-- ADD IN 
 <plugins>
     <plugin>
SECTION -->

<!-- TO CONFIGURE TEST EXECUTION -->
             <plugin>
              <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
              <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
              <configuration>
               <excludes>
                <exclude>**/*Test.java</exclude>
                <!-- NOT NEEDED -->
                <!--  <exclude>**/error/*.java</exclude>
                <exclude>**/to/*.java</exclude>
                <exclude>**/eto/*.java</exclude>
                <exclude>**/persistence/model/*.java</exclude>
                <exclude>**/persistence/model/jpa/*.java</exclude>
                <exclude>**/persistence/model/jpa/defaultentity/*.java</exclude>
                <exclude>**/persistence/dao/jpa/*.java</exclude>
                <exclude>**/test/util/*.java</exclude> -->
               </excludes>
              </configuration>
             </plugin>
